summary.span: 和 的基类。

span.span: The base class for and .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ CustomDeadLetterQueue { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };
member this.CustomDeadLetterQueue : Uri with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 ，过期消息或未能传递的消息将在该 Uri 标识的自定义死信队列中进行发送。

span.span: Gets or sets a that identifies a custom dead-letter queue where expired messages or messages that failed to be delivered are sent.

value.span: 自定义死信队列的 URI。

span.span: The URI of the custom dead-letter queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 死信队列是由发送应用程序的队列管理器管理的队列，可以存储未能传递或已过期的消息。A dead-letter queue is a queue managed by the sending application's queue manager that stores messages that have failed to be delivered or have expired. 使用 属性可以指定自定义死信队列，而不必使用默认的系统级死信队列。The property allows you to specify a custom dead-letter queue rather than using the default system-wide dead-letter queue. 指定的 URI 必须使用 `net.msmq scheme`。The URI that is specified by must use the `net.msmq scheme`. 如果 设置为 或 ，则 必须设置为 `null`。If is set to or , then must be set to `null`. 如果 不为 `null`，则 必须设置为 。If is not `null`, then must be set to . 属性只能在 [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)] 或更高版本的操作系统上设置。The property can be set only on operating systems starting with [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::DeadLetterQueue DeadLetterQueue { System::ServiceModel::DeadLetterQueue get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::DeadLetterQueue value); };
member this.DeadLetterQueue : System.ServiceModel.DeadLetterQueue with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置此绑定的 设置。

span.span: Gets or sets the setting for this binding.

value.span: 要使用的死信队列（如果有的话）的类型。

span.span: The type of dead-letter queue to use, if any.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 死信队列是由发送应用程序的队列管理器管理的队列，可以存储未能传递或已过期的消息。The dead-letter queue is a queue managed by the sending application's queue manager that stores messages that have failed to be delivered or have expired. 造成消息未能到达接收应用程序的原因包括：The reasons that a message can fail to reach the receiving application include: - 事务性消息被发送到非事务性队列中。A transactional message is sent to a non-transactional queue. - 非事务性消息被发送到事务性队列中。A non-transactional message is sent to a transactional queue. - 未经身份验证的消息被发送到仅接受经过身份验证的消息的队列中。An unauthenticated message is sent to a queue that accepts only authenticated messages. - 未加密的消息被发送到仅接受加密消息的队列中。An unencrypted message is sent to a queue that accepts only encrypted messages. - 消息在传递给接收方之前过期。The message expires before the message is delivered to a receiver. - 超出了目标计算机的消息存储配额或目标队列的存储配额，或者在消息到达时目标计算机上没有可用的存储空间。The message storage quota of the target computer or the storage quota of the destination queue is exceeded, or there is no available storage space on the target computer when the message arrives. - 发送方不具有[访问权限](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96167)需将消息放入目标队列。The sender does not have the [access rights](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96167) required to place the message in the destination queue. - 附加在消息上的数字签名无效。The digital signature attached to the message is not valid. - 加密的消息不能由目标队列管理器解密。An encrypted message cannot be decrypted by the destination queue manager. - 目标队列在检索消息之前被清除或删除。The destination queue is purged or deleted before the message is retrieved.

exception.span: 该值不在 中定义的值范围之内。

span.span: The value is not within the range of values defined in .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Durable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Durable : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定随此绑定发送的消息是持久的还是可变的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether messages sent with this binding are durable or volatile.

value.span: 如果此绑定处理的消息是持久的，则为 ；如果这些消息是可变的，则为 。

span.span: if the messages processed by this binding are durable; if they are volatile.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性设置为 `true`，则消息是持久的；否则，消息是可变的。If this property is set to `true`, messages are durable; otherwise, messages are volatile. 即使队列管理器崩溃，持久性消息也不会丢失。Durable messages are not lost if the queue manager crashes. 此属性的默认值为 `true`。The default value for this property is `true`. 如果要求一次性保证（ 设置为 `true`），此属性必须设置为 `true`。When exactly once assurances are required ( is set to `true`), this property must be set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExactlyOnce { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ExactlyOnce : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定随此绑定发送的消息是否具有一次性保证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether messages sent with this binding have exactly once assurances.

value.span: 如果随此绑定发送的消息具有一次性保证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if messages sent with this binding have exactly once assurances; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 设置为 `true` 时，指示消息队列 (MSMQ) 会确保将发送的消息传递到接收消息队列一次且只有一次，如果传递失败，则会根据 `DeadLetterQueue` 属性设置，将消息发送到死信队列。, when set to `true`, indicates that Message Queuing (MSMQ) ensures that a sent message is delivered to the receiving message queue once and only once, and, if delivery fails, the message is sent to the dead-letter queue, depending on the `DeadLetterQueue` property setting. 若要将 设置为 `true`，则要求队列为事务性队列。Setting to `true` requires the queue to be transactional.

MemberSignature.Value: public override T GetProperty<T> (System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext context) where T : class;

Public Overrides Function GetProperty(Of T As Class) (context As BindingContext) As T

The for the binding element.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，为提供的绑定上下文检索指定类型的对象。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, retrieves a specified type of object for the binding context provided.
The object of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可检索来自该元素的功能和保护要求。Provides the functionality to retrieve capabilities and protection requirements from the element.

span.span: The context is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxRetryCycles { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxRetryCycles : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置尝试向接收应用程序传递消息的最大重试周期数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of retry cycles to attempt delivery of messages to the receiving application.

value.span: 一个值，指定将消息传输到病毒消息队列之前的重试周期数。

span.span: A value that specifies the number of retry cycles to attempt prior to transferring a message to the poison-message queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重试周期是指将消息从重试队列传输到应用程序队列以尝试向应用程序传递的时间。A retry cycle is when a message is transferred from the retry queue to the application queue to attempt delivery to the application. 若立即重试失败次数达到 指定的值，消息则被放到重试队列中。Messages are placed in the retry queue after failing a number of immediate retries as specified by . `MaxRetryCycles` 指定重试周期数，它不包含第一次发送消息的尝试。`MaxRetryCycles` specifies the number of retry cycles and does not include the initial attempt to send the message. 最多会进行 (1 + MaxRetryCycles) \* (ReceiveRetryCount + 1) 次传递消息的尝试。An attempt to deliver a message is made a maximum of (1 + MaxRetryCycles) \* (ReceiveRetryCount + 1) times. 例如，如果 ReceiveRetryCount 为 0，且 MaxRetryCycles 为 1，则最多将进行两次传递消息的尝试。For example, if ReceiveRetryCount = 0 and MaxRetryCycles is 1, there is a maximum of two attempts to deliver the message. 此属性只能在 [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)] 或更高版本的操作系统上使用。This property is used only on operating systems starting with [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)].

span.span: The value is less than zero.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MsmqTransportSecurity As MsmqTransportSecurity

summary.span: 获取与此绑定元素关联的 。

span.span: Gets the that is associated with this binding element.
The that is associated with this binding element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可包装 MSMQ 集成传输的安全设置。 encapsulates the security settings for the MSMQ integration transport. MSMQ 集成传输和排队传输的设置是相同的。The settings are the same for both the MSMQ integration and queued transports. 使用 可以设置身份验证模式、加密算法、安全哈希算法和保护级别。 allows you to set the authentication mode, encryption algorithm, secure hash algorithm, and protection level.

member this.ReceiveContextEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示是否请求接收上下文行为的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the receive context behavior is requested.

value.span: 如果此绑定支持接收上下文行为，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the binding supports receive contextbehavior ; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::ReceiveErrorHandling ReceiveErrorHandling { System::ServiceModel::ReceiveErrorHandling get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::ReceiveErrorHandling value); };
member this.ReceiveErrorHandling : System.ServiceModel.ReceiveErrorHandling with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个枚举值，该值指定如何处理病毒消息和其他无法调度的消息。

span.span: Gets or sets an enumeration value that specifies how poison and other messages that cannot be dispatched are handled.

value.span: 一个 值，指定如何处理病毒消息和其他无法调度的消息。

span.span: A value that specifies how poison and other messages that cannot be dispatched are handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为 时，通道侦听器会出错，并且会跟踪和引发一个 （它包装一个 ）。When this property is set to , the channel listener is faulted and a (wrapping a ) is traced and thrown. 消息会留在队列中，并且必须通过某种手动方法移除。The message is left in the queue and must be removed by some manual method. 包含一个 ，它可用于标识有问题的消息并将其从病毒消息队列中手动移除。The contains a that can be used to identify and manually remove the offending message from the poison-message queue. 当此属性设置为 时，就会丢弃消息。When this property is set to , the message is dropped. 当此属性设置为 时，会将一个否定确认发送到客户端，并从病毒消息队列中移除消息。When this property is set to , a negative acknowledgment is sent to the client and the message is removed from the poison-message queue. 此选项仅在“消息队列 4.0”(Message Queuing 4.0) 中可用。This option is available only on Message Queuing 4.0. 当设置为 时，会将消息移动到最后一个病毒子队列。When set to , the message is moved to the final poison sub-queue. 此选项仅在“消息队列 4.0”(Message Queuing 4.0) 中可用。This option is available only on Message Queuing 4.0.

exception.span: 该值不在 中定义的值范围之内。

span.span: The value is not within the range of values defined in .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ReceiveRetryCount { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ReceiveRetryCount : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置队列管理器在将消息传输到重试队列前可尝试发送该消息的最大次数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of times the queue manager should attempt to send a message before transferring it to the retry queue.

value.span: 一个值，指定队列管理器在将消息传输到重试队列前应尝试发送该消息的最大次数。

span.span: A value that specifies the maximum number of times the queue manager should attempt to send a message before transferring it to the retry queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果达到尝试传递的最大次数且应用程序仍未处理消息，则会将消息发送到重试队列，以便在将来某个时刻重新进行传递。If the maximum number of delivery attempts is reached and the message is not accessed by the application, then the message is sent to a retry queue for redelivery at some later point in time. 将消息传输回发送队列之前的时间量由 控制。The amount of time before the message is transferred back to the sending queue is controlled by . 如果重试周期达到 MaxRetryCycles 值，则根据 属性值调度此消息。If retry cycles reach the MaxRetryCycles value, then the message is dispatched based on the value of the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 。For more information, see and .

span.span: The value is less than zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan RetryCycleDelay { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.RetryCycleDelay : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在尝试传递无法传递的消息时，尝试另一个重试周期之前应等待的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies how long to wait before attempting another retry cycle when attempting to deliver a message that could not be delivered.

value.span: 一个 ，指定在开始下一个尝试传递到接收应用程序的周期前等待的时间间隔。

span.span: The that specifies the interval of time to wait before starting the next cycle of delivery attempts to the receiving application.
The default value is 30 (minutes).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单个重试周期会重复尝试将消息传递给接收应用程序（由 属性指定）。A single retry cycle makes repeated attempts to deliver a message to the receiving application (specified by the property). 如果所有尝试都失败，则会将消息放回到重试队列中。If all attempts fail, the message is placed back in the retry queue. 此属性指定在将消息传输到应用程序队列以便进入另一个重试周期之前，消息保留在重试队列中的时长。This property specifies how long the message remains in the retry queue before it is transferred to the application queue for another retry cycle. 此属性只能在 [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)] 或更高版本的操作系统上使用。This property can only be used on operating systems starting with [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)].

exception.span: 该值不可为无穷大，并且要大于 Int32.MaxValue 毫秒。

span.span: The value is not infinite and larger than Int32.MaxValue milliseconds.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan TimeToLive { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.TimeToLive : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定消息有效的时长。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies how long messages are valid.

summary.span: 过了这段时间之后，会根据 设置将消息放置到死信队列中。

span.span: When this time has elapsed the message is placed in a dead-letter queue depending on the setting.

value.span: 一个 值，它指定消息有效的时长。

span.span: A value that specifies how long messages are valid.
The default value is 24 hours.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 排队应用程序以断开连接的方式工作。Queued applications work in a disconnected manner. 这意味着发送和接收应用程序可能不同时运行。因此，发送应用程序所发送的消息可能不会立即受到接收应用程序处理。This means that the sending and receiving applications may not be running at the same time; therefore, a message sent by the sending application may not be processed immediately by the receiving application. 有些消息包含只在某个时间段内有效的信息。Some messages contain information that is valid only for a certain period of time. 这样的消息如果未在这个时间段内传送，则不再包含有用的信息，应予以丢弃。If such a message is not delivered within that period of time, it no longer contains useful information and should be dropped. 使用此属性可以指定在将消息传递到应用程序队列之前，应保留该消息的时间限制。This property enables you to specify a time limit for how long a message is kept prior to delivery to the application queue. 如果在将消息传递到应用程序队列之前，过了此时间限制，则会将消息放置到可用的死信队列中（由 属性确定）；否则，会丢弃消息。If this time limit elapses prior to the message being delivered to the application queue, the message is placed in the dead-letter queue if one is available (determined by the property); otherwise, the message is dropped.

exception.span: 该值不可为无穷大，并且要大于 Int32.MaxValue 毫秒。

span.span: The value is not infinite and larger than Int32.MaxValue milliseconds.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TransactedReceiveEnabled As Boolean
public: property bool TransactedReceiveEnabled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定是否需要使用事务来接收随此绑定发送的消息。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether a transaction is required to receive messages with this binding.

value.span: 如果绑定需要使用事务来进行接收操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the binding requires a transaction for a receive operation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调度程序会访问此属性来确定是否需要使用事务来进行接收操作。The dispatcher accesses this property to determine whether a transaction is required for a receive operation. WCF 中排队的传输返回`true`此属性，且仅当设置为`true`。The queued transport in WCF returns `true` for this property if, and only if, is set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseMsmqTracing { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseMsmqTracing : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值启用或禁用消息队列 (MSMQ) 内置消息跟踪工具。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables the Message Queuing (MSMQ) built-in message tracing facility.

value.span: 如果应启用消息队列 (MSMQ) 内置消息跟踪，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if Message Queuing (MSMQ) built-in message tracing should be enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 设置为 `true`，则排队通道使用消息队列内置消息跟踪工具。When is set to `true`, the queued channel uses the Message Queuing built-in message tracing facility. 每当消息进入和离开队列管理器时，都会通过此工具将报告消息发送到指定的报告队列。Through this facility a report message is sent to a specified report queue each time a message enters and leaves a queue manager.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseSourceJournal { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseSourceJournal : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应将此绑定处理的消息副本存储到源日记队列中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether copies of messages processed by this binding should be stored in the source journal queue.

value.span: 如果将此绑定处理的消息复制到源日记队列中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if messages processed by this binding are copied to the source journal queue; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果排队应用程序要保留已离开源计算机传出队列的消息的记录，则可以将这些消息复制到日记队列。Queued applications that keep a record of messages that have left the source computer's outgoing queue can have the messages copied to a journal queue. 一旦消息离开传出队列，并且接收到目标计算机已接收该消息的确认后，该消息的副本就会保留在发送计算机的系统日记队列中。After a message leaves the outgoing queue and an acknowledgment is received that the message was received on the destination computer, a copy of the message is kept in the sending computer's system journal queue.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ValidityDuration { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.ValidityDuration : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定由接收上下文功能锁定消息的持续时间。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the duration a message will be locked by the receive context feature.

value.span: 将由接收上下文功能锁定消息的持续时间。

span.span: The duration a message will be locked by the receive context feature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 5 分钟。The default value is 5 minutes. 接收上下文将锁定消息以进行检查，直到使用完消息或将其释放回队列。Receive context locks the message for inspection until it is either consumed or released back onto the queue. 有效期属性指定在自动将消息释放回队列之前，由接收上下文锁定消息的时长。The validity duration property specifies how long the message will remain locked by receive context before it is automatically released back onto the queue. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当 对某一消息过期时，如果过期是在事务处理期间发生的，则会随工作流实例一起中止用于其处理的任何事务。If expires for a message, any transaction that may be used for its processing will be aborted along with the workflow instance if the expiration occurs during the transaction.

span.span: The value is less than zero or is larger than Int32.MaxValue.
